sentences.sContent: One possibility is that the blast was like an ultra-powerful solar flare.
sentences.sContent_eng: One possibility is that the blast was like an ultra-powerful solar flare.
sentences.sCn: 一种可能的原因是这种爆炸很像有超级能量的太阳耀斑。

sentences.sContent: Indeed, last month, we looked at evidence that the last flare up occurred only a few hundred years ago.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, last month, we looked at evidence that the last flare up occurred only a few hundred years ago.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，上个月，我们在看最近一次，也就是几百年前的耀斑发生的有关证据。

sentences.sContent: Their diaphanous flare symbolizes at once grace and tragedy, innocence and despair, sadness and voluptuousness.

sentences.sCn: 它们半透明的闪光象征着优雅与悲剧，天真与绝望，悲伤与奢华。
